item.title: Writing Custom Wazuh Rules
item.description: Wazuh is a powerful open-source security monitoring platform that acts as a SIEM/XDR solution. Though it has some shortcomings, it has tons of strengths, my favorite ones being; its customizability and its open-source nature. This article will be more or less a tutorial on how to write a simple custom wazuh rule to detect potential port scans on a monitored host. The setup is as follows: Wazuh manager (4.14.1) running on a Linux VM.
